articles.author: Josh Gerstein
articles.title: Trump administration has failed to deport Kilmar Abrego Garcia to Africa - Politico
articles.description: Three African nations won’t accept the Salvadoran native, who was already deported illegally once and then brought back to the U.S.
articles.content: Abrego is originally from El Salvador. He entered the U.S. illegally and lived in Maryland for more than a decade before he was arrested in March and deported to a notorious Salvadoran prison. Courts… [+4912 chars]
